Judul: MAX  as  an  Overall  Control  Mechanism  for  Multidiscipline  Installation  Art
Abstrak:
Installation art aims to establish a self-defining artistic universe, a landscape of the imagination, 
enclosed within a self-contained sculptural space which the audience enters, and by the act of 
entering, becomes, themselves, a part of it. This paper deals with the use of MAX as an overall 
control mechanism for the coordination of the various musical elements involved in an installation piece.
Kata Kunci: MAX,  Electronic  music,  Installation  art,  MIDI,  Computer  music
Sumber: Computers  Math.  Applic.  Vol.  32,  No.  1,  pp.  11-16,  1996
